entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023
